title: combined area of rectangles - determine design

content.question: A student wants to create an algorithm to calculate the combined total area of two rectangles. Which of the following algorithms can be used to perform this calculation?

choices.label: Step 1:Multiply the length of the first rectangle by the length of the second rectangle.Step 2:Multiply the width of the first rectangle by the width of the second rectangle.Step 3:Add the result of step 1 to the result of step 2.

Step 1:Multiply the length of the first rectangle by the width of the first rectangle.Step 2:Multiply the length of the second rectangle by the width of the second rectangle.Step 3:Add the result of step 1 to the result of step 2.

Step 1:Add the length of the first rectangle to the width of the first rectangle.Step 2:Add the length of the second rectangle to the width of the second rectangle.Step 3:Multiply the result of step 1 by the result of step 2.

Step 1:Add the length of the first rectangle to the length of the second rectangle.Step 2:Add the width of the first rectangle to the width of the second rectangle.Step 3:Multiply the result of step 1 by the result of step 2.

content.answer: Step 1:Multiply the length of the first rectangle by the width of the first rectangle.Step 2:Multiply the length of the second rectangle by the width of the second rectangle.Step 3:Add the result of step 1 to the result of step 2.

topic.text: 1.1: Introduction to Algorithms, Programming, and Compilers

skill.text: 1.A: Determine an appropriate program design to solve a problem or accomplish a task.
